title: French power group EDF raises cost estimate for Britain's Hinkley Point C
text:
French power group EDF raises cost estimate for Britain's Hinkley Point C

Stock Markets 9 minutes ago (Sep 25, 2019 07:51)

PARIS (Reuters) - French state-controlled power group EDF (PA: ) on Wednesday raised its cost estimate for the Hinkley Point C nuclear plant in Britain. EDF said the cost to complete Hinkley Point C was now estimated at between 21.5-22.5 billion pounds, an increase of 1.9-2.9 billion pounds from prior estimates. EDF added that the Hinkley Point C project had successfully completed one key element, namely the nuclear island's "common raft" for its first unit in June 2019, in line with a schedule announced in September 2016.

French power group EDF raises cost estimate for Britain's Hinkley Point C
description: French power group EDF raises cost estimate for Britain's Hinkley Point C
